name: Doll Plague
description:
Entry for Jame Gam #19

You are Felix, a young boy out open to stop a  plague. Help him by making right choices. Information available is that there is plague causing because of a doll?

The Last Doll made by the lady dollmaker after which all this tragedy happened.

Sorry because of less time I could not add tutorial.

-  You need to collect ammo which will help you make different decisions.

- When the game starts , above are shown you healthbar and how much ammo you have left.
- Dodging System - You need to click the dodge button before the time ends. There is a timing bar shown under the button.

Comment If you have any suggestions or feedback. I would love to hear it.
